LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.SelectCorpse: Field repair: select a mechanoid corpse.
LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.TargetNotDead: Field repair: target is not dead.
LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.OnlyMechCorpse: Field repair: can only be used on mechanoid corpses.
LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.OnlyFriendlyMechs: Field repair: can only repair friendly mechanoids.
LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.NotSameMap: Field repair: target is not on the same map.
LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.NeedTouchCorpse: Field repair: must touch the target corpse.
LanguageData.PRT_BattlefieldRepair.ResurrectFailed: Field repair failed: cannot resurrect the target.
